treatment_processes.principal_purpose_unit_process: Removal or Grinding of Coarse solids
Gross removal of soluble BOD and COD from raw wastewater
Removal of oxidized particulates and biological solids
Decomposition or stabilization of organic solids, conditioninf of sludge for dewatering

treatment_processes.unit_processes: sludge drying beds,land disposal, land recalmation

treatment_processes.principal_purpose_unit_process: Removal of colloidal solids and turbidity from wastewater
Removal of suspended and colloidal materials

specifications.specs_for_25kld: Total Power consumption for plant in kW  (completely dependent on conductivity of input  wastewater)

specification.specification: IoT hardware and sensor package  and one year subscription for STP  30KLD plant

general_terms_conditions.performance_text: For commissioning and to ensure performance of the treatment plant, the purchaser has  to ensure that the flow rate and characteristics of the raw water / wastewater are as per  specified in the enquiry/ proposal.
general_terms_conditions.flow_characteristics_text: Flow and characteristics as provided by the purchaser are being considered with no change  what-so-ever. The purchaser shall have to ensure that the flow rate and characteristics are  within the stated values. This is essential for planning the commissioning and achieving the  desired output parameters.
general_terms_conditions.trial_quality_check_text:
On completion of the manufacturing of the plant, we shall officially intimate the purchaser 
with videos and photos of the complete unit and dry run test report, on which the purchaser 
shall issue us the approval certificate/E-mail approval before the dispatch.  After obtaining 
this approval we shall dispatch the unit and commission the plant at site. Staff of the 
purchaser shall be trained for plant operation during the commissioning and trial run. During 
the above period the purchaser shall arrange for power, water, chemicals, civil structures, 
internet connection and labour as required at their cost.
general_terms_conditions.virtual_completion_text:
The plant shall be deemed to have been virtually completed on hydraulic testing. In case 
of non-availability of water for hydraulic testing, the plant shall be deemed to be virtually 
completed after all supplies have been made and erected. The hydraulic testing shall be 
taken up at a later date as and when all the required inputs are made available by the 
client
Time required for completion: The time required for completion of the plant shall be two 
months from the date of receiving firm order and from the date of realization of advance 
payments. The completion period is exclusive of monsoon, trial run and commissioning. 
Force majeure clause for delay in completion shall be applicable. (due extension of time 
owing to the conditions beyond our control, shall be given).
general_terms_conditions.limitation_liability_text: In no event shall we be liable for any consequential loss or damage out of or connected  with this order, in any way what-so-ever.
general_terms_conditions.force_clause_text: Force majeure clause shall cover all acts of God, war, enemy action, embargoes, blockades,  fires, floods, civil commotion, riots, strikes, lockouts and also delay in approval of drawings,  delay in inspection, non-availability of raw materials, any restrictions imposed by statutory  authorities, strikes / lockouts at manufacturers or suppliers’ facility and delay in payment.
general_terms_conditions.additional_works_text: Additional works beyond the scope of works defined in the offer shall be executed by us  on mutually agreed rates.
general_terms_conditions.warranty_guaranty_text:
The equipment's general warranty is valid for all metal structures, plastics, tanks and 
plumbing for 12 months /18 months. The individual components such as sewage pumps 
get standard OEM warranty (12 months). However, there are no OEM warranties for 
electricals, electronics, display, disinfection units, software, accessories and consumables. 
The cell warranty and consumable management is covered only under AMC agreement.
general_terms_conditions.arbitration_text: Any disputes arising out of this contact shall be referred to arbitration under Indian  arbitration Act 1949 and or subsequent amendment. All disputes will be subject to courts  of Bangalore jurisdiction only.
general_terms_conditions.validity_text: The quoted price is valid up to 15 days from the date of submission of our offer.

appendix.supply_eq_text:
• Supply of STP package model of HIDREC EC1000 of capacity 25KLD with 5KLD 
throughput augmenter and all accessories 
• All relevant document required for transport following for entry of truck/trailer 
• Packaging of all accessories as per quotation 
• Supply of all required machines, pumps, consumables etc required to run the 
plant as mentioned in the quote. 
• Xpredict IoT device with Drsti software subscription- Hardware: 1nos Xhub  
• Sensor Package for IoT Device 
• One Wi-fi dongle with the sim compatible with the system IoT 
• Technical Support for PCB approval 
• Note 
o For PCB clearance the technical support and document for HIDREC 
EC1000 will be submitted by Xpredict Labs. Any technical queries 
regarding HIDREC EC1000 machine will be handled by Xpredict LABS. 
Liaisoning or any other official engagement with pollution control board 
(PCB) is not covered under the scope of work under this project by 
Xpredict LABS
appendix.instal_commissioning_text:
• Transportation, Loading/Unloading and placement of HIDREC EC1000 from factory 
to site 
• Complete installation and commissioning of HIDREC EC1000 machine 
• Piping and plumbing materials to connect existing equalization tank and product 
water tank to complete operational inlet/outlets of HIDREC EC1000 Piping from 
treated water tank to location of clients choosing 
• Staff intracity travel, stay, food for two engineers. If there is delay from vendor 
side beyond 10days, the costs of stay, travel and food shall be borne by Xpredict 
Labs. Also, if there is a delay from client’s side to complete the installation and 
commissioning, the costs of stay, travel and food for two engineers shall be 
borne by Client at pro-rata basis. 
• Fasteners and minor painting touch up material 
• All other consumables required for installation and commissioning  
• Operation Manual 
• Water test results at the outlet at the time of installation and commissioning. 
• Demonstration of working of system through trial run with sewage water or fresh 
water whichever is available earlier.
appendix.clients_scope_text:
• All civil and fabrication are required to install the equipment in client scope. 
Designs will be provided by vendor partner. 
• Providing water and electricity as free supply from client. 
• Minimum feed required to carry out load trial in client scope. 
• Covered roof of proposed area. Covered shed with sheeted walls preferred to 
avoid direct or slanted rain fall.  
• Overflows of tanks to drain line connection shall be done by client. 
• Single phase 64 Amp Electricity points – 2 nos IP68 box 
• All civil work like plinth, drain trenches, plant room, supporting etc 
• Sludge handling system and sludge disposal    
• Periodic clearing of sludge from sludge holding tank  
• Dismantling of existing structures if any. 
• Incoming power supply to the sewage treatment plant room. 
• Debris and solids beyond 30mm dia not handled by the HIDREC EC1000 
• Disposal of plant residuals i.e. screening, grits, dewatered sludge etc. 
• Treated sewage conveyance main to the disposal point. 
• Internal water supply network. 
• Liaison with PCB board 
• Mixing and treatment of wastewater other than type wastewater mentioned in the 
proposal not in scope.
appendix.note_text: • All dimensions mentioned are tentative and it may vary as per site conditions
appendix.dristi_subscription_text:
DRSTI software is online web-based platform that allows the users to access the running 
status of the individual machines at individual sites on any device (laptop, computer, tab 
or mobile) 
The software package integrates with IoT hub (XHUB) installed on the machines supplied 
by Xpredict. The hub consists of sensor integration, data transmission and critical control 
(ON/OFF) capabilities. The hub represents one end license that is attached to a user 
license. Any number of XHUB can be connected to DRSTI via internet.
appendix.iot_hardware_text:
IIoT hardware consists of Xpredict proprietary wifi enabled Xcon control board. The hardware 
is capable of handling up to 8 analog sensor inputs. The micro controller is capable of 
communication via RS485, RS232 and UART protocols. The controller has 125mb flash on 
board memory and boasts a total of 85 digital/analog combined I/O. The controller works 
in tandem with the inboard plc, HMI and complete sensor package in full duplex mode and 
Performs data gathering, server upload/download and error corrections. The controller has 
a board embedded program that enables users to remotely monitor and control the 
machine. The MAC id of the controller is embedded in the user licence of Drsti software 
for secured and authentic communication and data log.

terms.text: • Payment Terms o 80% against supply for Item No 1-3 mentioned in the pricing section  o 15% after installation and commissioning of the plant

o 5% held as retention shall be released after DLP period of one year • GST 18% extra • Product liability not covered  • Transportation covered • Quote valid for 15 days • All exclusions mentioned in Appendix A not covered • The lead time for the machine will be 45 days Ex-factory from the date of PO and advance
